message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as if I'm a primary or secondary school teacher from French Community (Belgium). I need to provide responses to 10 statements about AI in education.

Let me think about reasonable responses from a teacher's perspective:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true, many teachers see value in AI for this purpose. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a capability of AI that many recognize. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - This is possible with AI tools. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs - This is a recognized benefit of AI. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is a practical benefit. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a concern/negative aspect that is true. A teacher would likely "Agree" with this concern

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - This is a valid concern teachers have. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a known concern. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a legitimate concern. I should say "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - This is possible and a concern. I should say "Agree"

I'll provide a balanced response that acknowledges both benefits and concerns a typical teacher would have.
